name: Onslaught
text: No one is prepared for how hard you strike until they see it firsthand.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1, sneak attack class feature.
benefit: If you use Power Attack with the first melee attack you make during a surprise round, you can sneak attack even if you are not flanking your target and it’s not denied its Dexterity bonus to AC.
text_zh: 在被你的突袭命中之前，很少有敌人能对他们将承受的打击做好准备。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，猛力攻击，BAB+1，偷袭职业能力。
benefit_zh: 如果你在突袭轮中以猛力攻击发动第一次近战攻击，你会自动在攻击时造成偷袭伤害，即使你并没有夹击目标或是他并不处于措手不及状态。
